mapper.select: select max(id) from ems_task a where to_char(a.createDate,'yyyymmdd')=#{createDate}

select f.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.style as prod_style,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from ems_equipment a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id inner join ems_taskequipmentlist f on a.ecode=f.ecode where f.task_id=#{task_id}
select count(ecode) from ems_taskequipmentlist where task_id=#{task_id}

select a.id,a.memo,a.type,a.status,a.pole_id,b.code as pole_code,b.longitude as pole_longitude,b.latitude as pole_latitude,a.pole_name,a.pole_address,a.createDate from ems_task a,ems_pole b where a.workunit_id=#{workunit_id} and a.pole_id=b.id and a.type=#{type}
and a.status in ('newTask','read','handling')
and a.status ='submited'
order by a.createDate desc
order by a.createDate asc
order by b.code desc
order by b.code asc

select a.id,a.memo,a.type,a.status,a.pole_id,b.code as pole_code,b.longitude as pole_longitude,b.latitude as pole_latitude,a.pole_name,a.pole_address,a.createDate from ems_task a,ems_pole b where a.workunit_id=#{workunit_id} and a.pole_id=b.id and (b.address like #{searchStr} or b.name like #{searchStr} or b.code like #{searchStr}) order by a.createDate desc

select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.style as prod_style,d.name as brand_name from (select f.*,a.subtype_id,a.prod_id,a.brand_id,a.style from ems_equipment a inner join ems_taskequipmentlist f on a.ecode=f.ecode and f.task_id=#{task_id}) a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id

select a.* from EMS_pole a
where (a.address like #{pole_name} or a.name like #{pole_name} or a.code like #{pole_name}) and a.workunit_id=#{workunit_id}

select * from ( select a.*,rownum rn from ems_task a,ems_taskequipmentlist b where a.id=b.task_id and ecode=#{ecode} and a.type='repair' and b.type='uninstall' and a.status in('complete','submited') order by a.submitDate desc ) t where t.rn <=1
select count(1) from ems_equipment where status not in (2,3,4) and ecode in (select ecode from ems_taskequipmentlist where task_id=#{task_id})
mapper.update: update ems_task set status='handling',startHandDate=sysdate where id=#{task_id}
mapper.select: select count(id) from ems_task where handleMethod_id=#{handleMethod_id}
select count(id) from ems_task where pole_id=#{pole_id} and type='repair' and status!='complete'
select count(id) from ems_task where patrolTaskType_id=#{patrolTaskType_id}
